channel.title: Coding problem help
channel.description:
how do i fix this my other coder did this and did not compile it to see it
pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:772: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:776: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.sendMessage(" You have been given mod status by " + c.playerName); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:777: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.playerRights = 1; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:778: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.logout(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:779: class, interface, or enum ex pected break; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:780: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:785: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:792: class, interface, or enum ex pected if (newNPC <= 200000 && newNPC >= 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:794: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.isNpc = true; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:795: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.updateRequired = true; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:796: class, interface, or enum ex pected c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:797: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:800: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:803: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:810: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:810: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:810: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:814: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.sendMessage(" You have been given donator status by " + c.playerName); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:815: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.playerRights = 4; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:816: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.isDonator = 1 ; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:817: class, interface, or enum ex pected c2.logout(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:819: class, interface, or enum ex pected break; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:820: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:825: class, interface, or enum ex pected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:832: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:832: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:832: class, interface, or enum ex pected for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i ++) { ^

item.title: Coding problem help
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

go into:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:
and press
Ctrl+g
And type in the box: 772. somewhere on that line or above is the error.

Read full topic
